SENT.plain: A 12-month-old infant presented with cerebral seizures and neurological deficits
MRI scan of the brain and angiography showed massive cerebral venous sinus thrombosis complicated by a dural arteriovenous fistula
Subsequent clotting analysis revealed a protein S deficiency
Screening for inherited coagulation inhibitor deficiency is recommended in children with unexplained or atypical thrombotic events
